price: ߒߠߋ ߡߊ߫ ߥߐ߬ߞߎߟߐ ߣߌ߫ ߡߐ߱ ߘߊ߲߫ ߞߎ߲߬ ߛߌ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߒ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
